texts.title: Forgot Your Password?
texts.descriptionEmail: Enter your email address and we will send you instructions to reset your password.
texts.descriptionUsername: Enter your username and we will send you instructions to reset your password.
texts.emailDescription: Enter your Email address and we will send you instructions to reset your password.
texts.usernameDescription: Enter your Username and we will send you instructions to reset your password.
texts.phoneDescription: Enter your Phone number and we will send you instructions to reset your password.
texts.phoneOrUsernameOrEmailDescription: Enter your Phone number or Username or Email address and we will send you instructions to reset your password.
texts.phoneOrEmailDescription: Enter your Phone number or Email address and we will send you instructions to reset your password.
texts.phoneOrUsernameDescription: Enter your Phone number or Username and we will send you instructions to reset your password.
texts.usernameOrEmailDescription: Enter your Username or Email address and we will send you instructions to reset your password.
